password_too_weak: Password is too weak. It must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, special character and be at least 8 characters long.
tenant_exists: Tenant name or slug already exists
group_cannot_be_own_parent: A group cannot be its own parent.
sso_token_invalid: SSO token is invalid or missing required fields
user_or_tenant_missing: User or tenant information not found in request payload.
permission_denied: User {{userId}} does not have permission to perform action '{{action}}' on resource '{{resource}}' in tenant {{tenantId}}.
default_role_not_configured: Default role for new users is not configured.
sessionid_required: SessionId required for user refresh token.
